title: The Duchess Approves
description: A duchess turns her back on tradition and discovers herself.
quote: You had your chance at the cotillion, you!
studio: Black and White Period Piece Old Lady Boring Movie Channel
altHero: a black and white shot of a woman in a droopy hat, her eyes tearing up
alt1: woman stands defiantly in front of an older woman
alt2: the older woman is the Queen
alt3: the younger woman reaches up to pull off her hat
alt4: she lets her hair fly free with gritted teeth
